action.name: Find in this folder
action.description: Search for files within this folder

action.name: Print file(s)
action.description: Send one or multiple files to the default printer

action.name: Combine multiple PDFs
action.command: bash "/home/batan/.local/share/scripts/Document PDF/PDF combine, split/Combine multiple PDFs" %F

action.name: Split into single-page PDFs
action.command: bash "/home/batan/.local/share/scripts/Document PDF/PDF combine, split/Split into single-page PDFs" %F
